title: Software Engineer
work:

  • Tech Stack: Golang, Python(Flask and Django), Java, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, OPA(Open Policy Agent), Grafana, RabbitMQ and AWS(EC2 and SQS).

title: Research Intern
